title: Pbe account password change
body: How can i change my pbe account password? I looked at older posts but they all had a link that isn't working

replies.body: If you're still having problems with that PBE password try reaching out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Our account agents should be able to help out there!
